title: Compass Pilot
explanation: The term 'diverse groups' is used in the context of social networks, structural biases in funding programs, and barriers to access, all of which relate to social and political inequalities. The context focuses on access and equity issues, indicating a sociopolitical rather than a strictly scientific meaning.

title: Project Incubation: Training Undergraduates in Collaborative Research Ethics
